description: Allows the mob to try to move to air once it is close to running out of its total breathable supply.
title: Swim Up For Breath

material_type.title: Idle Time
material_type.description: The material the mob is traveling in. An air block will only be considered valid to move to with a block of this material below it.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: The height (in blocks) above the mob's current position that it will search for a valid air block to move to. If a valid block cannot be found, the mob will move to the position this many blocks above it.

search_radius.title: Search Radius
search_radius.description: The radius (in blocks) around the mob's current position that it will search for a valid air block to move to.

speed_mod.title: Speed Mod
speed_mod.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this Goal.
